articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as Pakistan play Bangladesh in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: World Cup: Bangladesh bat first against Pakistan in crucial game

articles.description: Lionel Messi wins eighth men's Ballon d'Or as Spain's Aitana Bonmati claims women's award - reaction plus EFL Cup and Women's Nations League build-up.
articles.title: Reaction to Ballon d'Or awards and latest football news

articles.description: Saudi Arabia is in line to host the 2034 World Cup after Australia decides against bidding hours before the deadline.
articles.title: Saudi Arabia set to host 2034 World Cup

articles.description: Ugo Monye says Eddie Jones' resignation as Australia head coach nine months after his appointment "stinks".
articles.title: Monye says Jones' Australia resignation 'stinks'

articles.description: Argentina and Inter Miami forward Lionel Messi beats Erling Haaland to win the Ballon d'Or for an eighth time.
articles.title: Messi wins Men's Ballon d'Or for eighth time

articles.description: BBC Sport profiles Barcelona and Sweden forward Fridolina Rolfo, one of five nominees for the BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2023 award.
articles.title: Is Rolfo your Women's Footballer of the Year?

articles.description: Watch as Shaheen Afridi picks up the big wicket of Mahmudullah for 56 as Pakistan claim their fifth wicket against Bangladesh during their Cricket World Cup game in Kolkata.
articles.title: Shaheen picks up big wicket of Mahmudullah for 56

articles.description: Former England goalkeeper Karen Bardsley says action is needed to keep the close connection between fans and players.
articles.title: Why women's football must act to keep its magic

articles.description: Transfers involving Samuel Eto'o and Willian in 2013 are part of a Premier League investigation into potential financial rule breaches by Chelsea.
articles.title: Eto'o and Willian transfers probed by Premier League

articles.description: The stigma around neck guards in ice hockey "needs to change" following the death of Nottingham Panthers' Adam Johnson, says GB's Abbie Culshaw.
articles.title: Stigma around neck guards 'needs to change'
